TopicTitle: SpaceX 7 Kerbal Dragon v2 with Falcon 9 v1.1 complete rebuild!

Articles.Content:
Elon Musk just presented th new Dragon v2, it is capable of 7 crewmembers, has Super-Dracos and many other very cool features. I once had a very big thread "the SpaceX project" (Link in my signature). But it is very old now, so this is the new one with better replicas and mor high detailed stuff!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Looks cool but the real Dragon V2 has solar panels on the winglets too. I suggest you try to make them with struts, as you won't be needing the "solar stage's" winglets control surfaces anyway. What engines are you using for the 9-engine first stage. I tried to do it with the 215 kN engines but those hardly got the thing moving up.

Edit: I think that not the entire hull is covered in solar panels too.
There are different animations and it isn't complete clear yet how the SM will look like
I think most animations show one side that's covered in solar panels. Guess they ony aim that side at the sun...
